sources.title: Yellowstone
sources.description: Henry Hunter stars as park ranger Dick Sherwood, who gets mixed up in a series of murders. The killings are tied in with $90,000 in stolen money, which the four villains had hidden in a Yellowstone cave 17 years earlier. Upon their release from prison, each of the criminals makes a dash for the dough; only three survive.

sources.title: Yellowstone (1936) CRIME DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Henry Hunter, Judith Barrett, Andy Devine
Director: Arthur Lubin

An ex-con is murdered in Yellowstone National Park while a bank robber's son is searching for the loot his father hid there 20 years before.

sources.title: Yellowstone (1936) Action, Crime, Drama Full Length Movie
sources.description:
THE GREAT GEYSER MURDER MYSTERY!  An ex-con is murdered in Yellowstone National Park while a bank robber's son is searching for the loot his father hid there 20 years before.

Director: Arthur Lubin
Writers: Jefferson Parker, Stuart Palmer 
Stars: Henry Hunter, Judith Barrett, Andy Devine 
Genres: Action, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Romance

metadata.Plot: After eighteen years in prison, James Foster (Ralph Morgan) returns to Yellowstone National Park to retrieve stolen payroll and his daughter Ruth Foster (Judith Barrett), arrives to be with him. Also showing up at the lodge are gangsters Marty Ryan (Monroe Owsley) and "Dynamite" (Paul Fix ), detective Hardigan (Alan Hale) and a botanist, Franklin Ross (Rollo Loyd). Foster is murdered and the blame falls on Dick Sherwood (Henry Hunter), a young park ranger in love with Ruth.
metadata.Writer: Jefferson Parker, Stuart Palmer, Houston Branch
metadata.Actors: Henry Hunter, Judith Barrett, Andy Devine
